original_text: It is the smallest seed that there is. But when it starts to grow, it will become bigger than the largest bush. It will become a tree. The wild birds will come and they will build their nests among the branches of that tree.’
korean_text: 이는 모든 씨보다 작은 것이로되 자란 후에는 풀보다 커서 나무가 되매 공중의 새들이 와서 그 가지에 깃들이느니라

sentences.original_text: It is the smallest seed that there is
sentences.korean_translation: 그것은 있는 모든 씨앗 중에서 가장 작은 씨앗이다

sentences.original_text: But when it starts to grow
it will become bigger than the largest bush
sentences.korean_translation: 그것은 가장 큰 덤불보다 더 커질 것이다

sentences.original_text: and they will build their nests
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그들은 자신의 둥지를 만들 것이다

sentences.original_text: among the branches of that tree
